content.rendered:
Legal Assistant | Tulsa, OK
  • Local law firm is in need of a legal assistant who is extremely detail oriented
  • Must have previous legal assistant experience drafting documents (motions, discoveries, etc.)
  • Must have an understanding of Criminal Law, Personal Injury, Family law
  • Must have experience putting together case files
  • Great customer service skills are required
  • Must have stayed at previous jobs for at least one year
  • Accuracy is top priority
